commit.message:
lex.c (errorcount, sorrycount): Don't declare.

	* lex.c (errorcount, sorrycount): Don't declare.
	* repo.c (errorcount, sorrycount): Likewise.
	* typeck2.c (errorcount, sorrycount): Likewise.

From-SVN: r28427
